> [pigpog](#comment_5_1NVpW6BGgWn3oPYAjvsVjyHoBqApQpsJaP): lol dont worry im still figuring it out. It may not work

Ok i just got it working!!!!

Step 1: Install the python2-dev package:
`pkg i python2-dev`

Step 2: Install virtualenv using pip:
`pip2 install virtualenv`

Step 3: Download Zeronet's tar to termux's home directory:
https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroNet/archive/master.tar.gz

Step 4: Untar and change directory:
`tar xf master.tar.gz && cd ZeroNet-master`

Step 5: `virtualenv env`

Step 6: `source env/bin/activate`

Step 7: `pip2 install msgpack-python gevent`

Step 8: `python zeronet.py`

